title: BELLADONNA
description: Belladonna says the most about the kind of quality family or business you belong to and the kind of lifestyle you embrace. Made entirely 100% by hand signifying that all things worth waiting for are in fact in the end glorified through perseverance and courage.
techInfo: Internal frame: Wood and steel profiles
Back internal frame: Wood, flexible cold shaped polyurethane foam, polyester fiber
Seat cushion: Shaped polyurethane of different density, polyester fiber
Size: 135 cm W x 105 cm D x 72 cm H

title: LION
description: Lion's gentle and beautiful design is reminiscent of a flower's petal. Like flowers, the arms expand and bend outwards. A delicate yet clearly defined ensemble is made up of simple geometrical shapes.
techInfo: Structure: fiberglass, resin structure
Seat cushion: shaped polyurethane of different density, polyester fiber
Upholstery: fabric or leather
Size: 82cm W x 80cm D x 82cm H

title: HILTON
description: Hilton is a transitional design, both elegant and cultured in appearance. Hilton’s beauty lies in its curves, and in its ability to accent modern and traditional ambiances, truly a timeless design that can co-exist in both your day and night spaces.
techInfo: Structure: Solid wood, veneered multilayered wood panel
Back and armrest internal frame: Flexible cold shaped polyurethane foam, polyester fiber
Cover: Fabric or Leather
Size: 100cm W x 95cm D x 95cm H

title: PARKER
description: Parker is a subtle armchair that places importance on comfort in the modern world. It is highlighted by the exposed wood frame that make up its unified legs and arms. It is best seen in commercial settings like Hotel lobbies or as the accent chair in hotel rooms with a transitional décor package.
techInfo: Structure: Wood
Upholstery: Fabric or Leather
Exposed Wood Finish: Lacquered | Painted | Semi-Gloss or Matte
Size: 80cm W x 75cm D x 92cm H

title: UFO
description: The U.F.O. is a work of art designed by Mavimatt and exclusively manufactured by Able. It is an art piece for the residential or commercial setting. It offers practicality and function as a glorified rocking chair. Elevate your space by customizing your own U.F.O. chassis to compliment your luxury vehicle, yacht, or jet, as this masterpiece is made to order and always one-of-a-kind.
techInfo: Collection: Luxury - Fabric Choices and Leather Choices
Size: 170 cm Dia. x 96 cm H

title: HAZEL ARMCHAIR
description: Because of its regulated proportions, the Hazel Armchair gives the sense of immense comfort while remaining gently discreet. On the one hand, the lovely soft fabric and the addition of feathers contribute to the sofa's great comfort.
techInfo: Structure: Multilayered wood panel with flexible polyurethane foam
Seat cushion: Shaped polyurethane of different density, polyester fiber
Upholstery: Fabric or leather
Size: 115cm W x 100cm D x 80 cm H

title: DONNA
description: An inspiring design portraying the elegance of the female form. Long, elegant arms, legs and heels were the inspiration behind Donna.
techInfo: Structure: Multilayered wood panel with flexible polyurethane foam
Seat cushion: Shaped polyurethane of different density, polyester fiber
Upholstery: Fabric or Leather
Size: 74cm W x 110cm D x 80cm H

title: IRIS
description: Iris offers conventional typologies of armchair, sofa, and sectional. The armchair model is made without edges, offering round corners and a curved base to support the body with maximum seat and back comfort.
techInfo: Structure: Multilayered wood panel with flexible polyurethane foam
Seat cushion: Shaped polyurethane of different density, polyester fiber
Upholstery: Fabric or Leather
Size: 80cm W x 80cm D x 85cm H
